TopicTitle: One more german Kerbal has joined the Team

Articles.Content:
Hi guys,

I have like 40h played and today i got my first outter surface sample from Duna, unfortunatly, not enough fuel to make it home... sry Bill.

Tomo i will learn rundvouz and docking, to make another aproach with an mothership in orbit - cant wait

"We r all kerblings"
Hi. I'm only a little bit german and I live in the USA, but whatever! This is an awesome community, so don't forget to enjoy it.

Yay, another German.

Welcome and have fun!
